body:
* Several packages were tracking blt@develop unintentionally when +rocm.  0.4.0+ has breaking changes that need to be addressed before moving forward if you are exporting your CMake targets.

* CAMP doesn't depend on BLT so that was removed.

* Added a rocm specific version of BLT that is pre-0.4.0.

@dtaller @becker33 @davidbeckingsale 

Attempts to fix https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/23339
title: BLT version lockdown
